name: Budget Fix Handyman
description: Fast and affordable handyman service for basic repairs. No job too small! We focus on getting you back on track quickly without breaking the bank.

goodReviews.text: Great value for the price! He patched my wall hole quickly and it looks decent. Perfect if you're on a budget and need something done fast.
goodReviews.author: Mike T.

goodReviews.text: Super cheap and got the job done in under an hour. It's not perfect but honestly fine for a rental property.
goodReviews.author: Linda S.

badReviews.text: You get what you pay for. The patch is visible if you look closely and the texture doesn't match. He was nice but rushed through it.
badReviews.author: Rachel M.

badReviews.text: Work was sloppy. Had to hire someone else to fix his patch job. Save yourself the hassle and pay more for quality.
badReviews.author: David K.

name: Mike Johnson Handyman Services
description: Licensed handyman with 15+ years of experience. Specializing in drywall repair, painting, and general home maintenance. Reliable mid-range service.

goodReviews.text: Mike did a solid job on my drywall repair. Professional and reasonably priced. The work looks good and he was on time.
goodReviews.author: Sarah M.

goodReviews.text: Good work overall. Fixed multiple holes in my walls and they blend in well. Fair pricing for the quality.
goodReviews.author: David R.

badReviews.text: Work was fine but nothing special. He got the job done but I expected more attention to detail for the price. Had to point out a few spots that needed touch-ups.
badReviews.author: Jennifer K.

name: Elite Drywall Masters
description: Premium drywall repair specialists. Master craftsmen with 20+ years experience. We deliver perfection - insured, bonded, and fully licensed. Your walls deserve the best.

goodReviews.text: Worth every penny! They repaired damage from a pipe leak and you absolutely cannot tell anything was ever wrong. The texture matching is impeccable. True artisans!
goodReviews.author: Catherine B.

goodReviews.text: These guys are perfectionists in the best way. Spent hours getting the texture just right. Expensive but the quality is museum-level. My designer was blown away!
goodReviews.author: Jonathan W.

goodReviews.text: I've used many contractors over the years and these are the best I've ever seen. They treat your home like it's their own. Flawless work, professional, and meticulous.
goodReviews.author: Elizabeth P.

badReviews.text: The work is beautiful, I'll admit. But wow, the price! They quoted me $800 for a repair that other people quoted $200 for. Quality is there but not for everyone's budget.
badReviews.author: Tom S.
